prompt: A rare galactic location in the Celestial Empires universe, featuring the ‘Nexus of the Eternal Eclipse’. The scene is a vast, ethereal expanse where two massive celestial bodies almost align, casting an eternal, haunting eclipse over a mysterious planet below. Fragments of ancient starships orbit the eclipse, mingled with mythical star creatures. The cosmos is filled with radiant stars and nebulae in rich hues of purple and blue, with glowing runes and celestial symbols etched into the surrounding space. The overall visual evokes a sense of awe and mystique, blending futuristic technology with ancient, mystical aesthetics.
